values:
Today I say I love you,
Tomorrow I will too.
I know that I am not near,
To hold you when your blue.

I wish I could spend every second,
Chasing away the clouds,
bring the sunshine to you,
Just to make you smile.

I have done many things,
Pulled your heartstrings,
Kept you in the dark,
Not telling of things in my past.

We could have walked away,
But we know that tomorrow is better,
Just like the day we danced in the rain,
The sunshine came in the morning.

Yesterday, Today, and still to come,
That is when I will love you,
Ups and downs,
And through all the tough times.

Today I'm far away,
Tomorrow I wont be closer
Soon I will hold you,
Soon I will be home.

I sit here, on the steps,
holding my phone,
listening to the voice I love the most,
the tears run down my face

Ive hurt the one I love,
Said things that can't be taken back,
I need to fight,
I need to make things right

Days of past so dearly needed,
The ones that our hearts long for,
When we had no cares,
We were living our dreams

My heart cries out,
for the one I love,
She has my heart,
Till the day I die,
No other person,
could fill my heart like her

Ive hurt the one I love,
Said things that can't be taken back,
I need to fight,
I need to make things right

I need to fight,
I need to, I must,
I have no other choice,
I need to fight for the love of my life

I close my eyes,
Let all my cares go,
When I am here with you,
Nothing can go wrong,
You are my love.

Days have become weeks,
and Weeks into Months,
I look at you and find somethin new
to fall in love with everyday.

You know me for I am,
Not the mask I wear around others,
I am always looking forward
to when I can see you next.

You brighten up my day,
You smile and everything becomes alright,
you are my love, and i want to be with you forever.

The days of the past,
Still floating in my head,
When we use to hang in the hallways,
And just be us, not a care in the world.

Memories that we keep close,
We can never go back,
Just look for the next moment,
When we will see each other again.

Summer comes and we throw our caps,
We have come to the day,
the one we've been waiting for.
Lets begin a new life.

Memories that we keep close,
We can never go back,
I have left those days,
looking for new people to meet.

Leaving what we had,
taking on what is new.
Best wishes to all,
keep on living.

I hold her in my arms, 
The one I love, 
Everytime I thank God, 
For putting her in my life, 
I pray that the moment would never pass 

I asked for an angel, and I got one, 
Everytime she jumps to see me, 
Everything that she says, 
Every moment spent together, 
I see the love that she has for me 

She is the girl I long to see, 
The one that I show off to my friends, 
I would give all the things I have, 
Just to be with her another moment 

She isnt perfect,  
but neither am I, 
I love her and thats all that it takes, 
Through the tears, laughter, struggles, and smiles, 
My love for her grows, 

It took sometime for me to see, 
The one who is right for me, 
Showing me the love, 
That makes me love her, 
"More than Happiness" 



Cassie, you are everything Ive prayed for.

Cigar smoke lingers, 
My hand makes out the letters, 
I take another puff, 
Letting it sting my tounge, 
My mind is in a state, 
one that doesnt come often. 

My cold heart, the thing I have no control over, 
I fight it trying to be the one I want, 
Coldness takes over, 
And I my mind leaves, 
Im left with all the safe of anger, 
Only its open and i have no control. 

Her memories still in my head, 
The music gets louder, 
Fists start to clentch, 
Walk away from the group, 
The people who I thought had my back have turned, 
I have only a few still standing with me. 

My cold heart, the thing I have no control over, 
I fight it trying to be the one I want, 
Coldness takes over, 
And I my mind leaves, 
Im left with all the safe of anger, 
Only its open and i have no control. 

When the safe is cracked, 
Nothing is held back, 
Everything comes out. 

My cold heart, the thing I have no control over, 
I fight it trying to be the one I want, 
Coldness takes over, 
And I my mind leaves, 
Im left with all the safe of anger, 
Only its open and i have no control. 

My cold heart, the thing I have no control over, 
I fight it trying to be the one I want, 
Coldness takes over, 
And I my mind leaves, 
Im left with all the safe of anger, 
Only its open and i have no control.

Walking up the steps,
My eyelids are the flood gates.
I walked into a lost memory,
The ones for so long had comforted me.
This world has ways of twisting the minds thoughts.

Climbing to the next rung,
It takes everything my arms have.
Times that we had left down 6 feet.
I grab a hold of the next thing I see.
Just so happens to be a helping hand.

I fight back saying what I really want to say,
Words that have been pent up for a long time.
Ever since the fade,
the one day it all ended came closer.

The lights go down, the crowd leaves,
Its just you and me, no one else
Do you talk or do you walk
Your eyes say everything you think

I see in you eyes, 
I see a fire,
not the one of old,
a new one, a cold icy fire.
One that wants to drive a stake into my back.

Its up to you
But its between you and me,
leave others out,
or the game's on

This face I wear is starting to get thin,
I try to be strong, but I am truly weak.
My eyes seem to be dry,
but Rivers flow when I'm alone.
Everytime I see you,
A fire shoots through my heart.

Rise and Fall,
My mind has no control.
I live in a land where you are my tormentor,
My mouth becomes dry when I try to talk.

A war, the one I started,
With what you say is my stupidity.
What do I do, you know all my moves,
you had the time to study,
when all I did was love you.

Rise and Fall,
My mind has no control.
I live in a land where you are my tomentor,
My mouth becomes dry when I try to talk.

Beaten, Bruised, and Broken,
I will not let you keep me down.
This is my life, you were once part of it.
Now, you just a mistake like all the rest.

I am walking away,
I have no need to say sorry.
The things you brought up,
I've said my apoligizes for.

Rise and Fall,
I will take control,
I live in a land where you cannot touch me
My mouth holds back things that I truly want to say.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

To this day, I have said sorry multipul times, To this day, you still hang it over me.  I am sorry one last time, for the things that I did.  The last one, I have no reason.  

PEACE (to the rest of you)

I have come to a place,
Thinkin of falling over,
Leaving and not coming back,
Runaway and cut my losses,
Start anew in a place of peace.

My mind is spinning,
Thoughts flying around,
Meshing together,
Memories becoming a blur,
The ones I want,
Don't show.

I've found a place of peace,
Being brought to my feet,
Standing and holding my ground,
Left behind is the pain,
Anew I stand, Anew I walk

My body weak,
My mind lost,
My soul dying,

You Are My Place,
When with you,
I find my peace,
Nothing can take that away.

New Memories, 
The ones I want,
The ones I need,
Don't Leave

Hey Hey,

So now I'm 18.  Every year, time after time, something drastic happens that totally change where i thought I would be at this point of my life.  I have now stepped out of childhood.  It is time to leave what happened, what I "loved" for so long.  This is the end of that, no more lookin back.  I will no longer be here, for you.  From now on, I AM ME.  Not who you want me to be.  So in the words of DX.  We got to words for ya!    You know it.

PEACE

DAN VAN

PS. Thanks to all those who wished my a happy bday

Hey Hey,

So I thought I would finally write my thoughts out on the web for people to see.  If a certain person is reading this, You really did hurt me.  I spent time trying to make sure that it wouldn't end up like this.  I cared about you.  You meant a lot.  You say that I cheated.  I wouldnt do that to you.  I cared to much for you.  You said that we went downhill, you lost trust in me, that is what happened.  My trust was broken, but I guess it was my fault for letting it be built to fast.  I guess it is my fault for having a ballroom partner, wait no it's not my fault.  You didn't trust me, you thought I would go out on a date while going out with you.  There is wounds that need to heal, pieces that need to picked up.  I don't know what the future holds, but God is with me.  You come back on the 14th, do I really want to talk to you, not sure.  At the moment, I don't think it would be a good idea.  Have a great life, and PEACE OUT.

Dan Van

Hey,

So its been a long time since I've posted.  Today was my last day of classes, I have to go back and write one exam on Monday but thats about it.  How, done high school.  It still hasnt sunk in.  Well, I am really excited for this summer.  Work and hang out.  The only downfall is that Courtney isnt in town for my birthday.  Thats every year since Ive met her that she hasnt been here for it.  But I am gonna jet, its like 3 and i need to sleep a little.  Peace Out

Dan Van

Hey Hey,

So we are getting really close to grad.  I have my suit, and Courtney has her dress.  I just can't to be done with high school.

Hey Hey,

How is everyone doing,  I am Fantabulous.  Just sitting eatin chocolate, and reflecting on the last few weeks.  Mexico really.  I just can't believe that it is over and that it went by so fast.  Really, so much happened.  The plane ride, AWESOME.  First time, and it was a blast.  But we had a layover in Toronto.  That was freaking long, 5 hours in an airport, wait make it six because we were delayed an hour.   I really couldn't wait to get down to Mexico.  We did so much.  The sights and sounds, smells and feelings.  A lot was different.  The food was awesome.  But I have to talk about the events that took place.

Well, we did prayer walks, to the Zocalo(probably not spelt rite), and also at the Aztec(but not really built by them) pyrimids.  Both sights were really cool to see.  The cathedral at the Zocalo felt like it was a continueous funeral(sorry Courtney couldnt think of another way of saying it).  There was no hope there.  We also saw some political building, which held the consitution of Mexico.  That was really cool to see, just that Mexico seperated from another country and is some what like Canada.  This building also had photos.  It depicted the guy who the Aztecs thought to be a God, but tricked them, disfigured and discoloured.  We went to the latin american tower and tried to see as far as we could.  Didnt work to well.

This is where I tell you about the smog that is in Mexico City.  Valley plus 30 million people.  Not good for asthma.  Haven't had any trouble for a few years until I was there.  I felt weak and powerless to do anything bout it though.  God really helped me through this, gave me a lot of strength.

We taught an English Second Language class.  If we had to spell, it would have been horrible.  We had great conversations with the Mexicans that came out.  Alejandro, this guy was a genuis.  Designed a shirt, planned a presidential party, and owns a company.   Still really humble though.  Everyone there is just so sweet and kind.  You become family in 2 hours.

On Sunday, we went to Atizipan Church.  I thought that Asians really are energic when they worship.  Well so are the Mexicans.  And they are really prayer warriors.  They prayed for me and the rest of the missions group.  A guy named, Consaulo(not spelled like that) prayed for me and said that I would be loved everywhere I go, because I am a child of God.  Then Pastor Arturo(once again I horrible at spelling), He gave me many words of encouragement.  Compared me to King David.  The way that he did what God told him, and that he repented and hated his sins.

We also helped out at an orphanage, well something like it.  It is like youth for christ in Winnipeg.  The kids come and learn, hang out, do crafts, play games and have some food.  Well we bought hamburgers and hot dogs, and the kids were so excited about getting meat to eat.  What really hit me was how one little girl was collecting cans so that she could pay the 5 dollars she had to pay to go to camp, Union Biblica covers the rest.  They play soccer, the field is on the other side of a dump.  

I made paper airplanes for the kids and they loved it.  Amused by the little things.  They have nothing, but have so much joy.  I pray I could have joy, I am blessed with much.  I am typing on a Laptop.

Well I am starting to get tired, Peace Out.

DAN
VAN

PS there is more to come

Well just got from the Disciple concert. There was only one disappointment, FF5 was double booked and couldn't make. The rest of the concert was GREAT. The pit was small, but then the venue was too. I will never go to pantagous unless it is a band that I really, REALLY like. Decyfer Down and Fireflight were good. The pit was pretty tame. Then Disciple came on stage, within the pit was crazy. I was right against the guard rail. And this is where the name comes from. Well, as most of you know, the guard rail is suppose to keep the fans at a distance that they can't the performers. Well as Winnipeggers, and CANADIANS we got crazy and broke it. This meant that the old orchestra pit was used. I am proud to say that I was one of the crazy fans that help break it by leaning on it. The lead sing of Disciple is awesome, and he loves his fans. Making sure that no one got hurt, but letting us get wild. At the end of the show me and Steve were still standing in the front, and the drummer through his stick towards up. Then we went to BK. On the way home, Courtney went crazy because I was drumming with the stick in one hand and then with hers in the other. Now my ears are ringing, voice is failing, and I have bruises on my hip, ribs, elbow, leg, and cuts on my elbow and hip. This was the first time Disciple came to Winnipeg and Canada, and they said that we are so much more crazier(I know its not a word, but that is how I want it) then the fans down in the states, and most places they have played. Courtney got my Valentine's Day Gift, we are not keeping them secret this year. I can't wait to be able to wear it on the 14th. At least I have my hat and shirt. Well I gotta jet and get some sleep. 

Peace Out, 
Dan Van 

PS Go out and get Scars Remain, one of the best CD's I own at the moment.

Hey Hey,

That is the countdown til grad.  Its bloody insane.  In like 7 I'm 18.  Thats crazy. But to the more immediate future, I'm looking forward till Friday and Saturday.  Friday I'm going to the Disciple concert(www.disciplerocks.com)  Four bands, great friends, and a very sweaty venue.  Then on Saturday I am going to MissionFest, then I will probably work and then.......... wait for it.................. WORK PARTY.  BOO YEA.  It came a long time after the Christmas season.  Then on Monday, it is the new semister, and that means DANCE CLASS WITH MRS. PAGE.

Peace out,

Dan Van

Hey Hey,

Just getting ready for CHRISTmas dinner with the family.  Thought I would right a quick post.  My next week is going to be busy.  I have a lot to do and then on saturday Im goin to the moose game with my dad.  I got some new clothing, 2 games, 2 cds, a cordless drill, and a comforter for my bed.  SWEET, oo and the tix for the moose game.  then my rents got the 3 brothers a cordless xbox controller so.  This is one of the best CHRISTmases ever.  I cant wait for dinner.  Well i gotta jet. Peace

Dan Van

Hey Hey,

Well it is getting really close to CHRISTmas.  Looking forward to hangin with the family and the 2 weeks of school.  Been working a lot lately.  Life slips away so fast.  Just look at the bright side.  We can still act immature for a few more months, then we have to grow up.

To everyone though. (this includes the people that i don't see eye to eye with) May God Bless you during this CHRISTmas season.  Lest we forget the true meaning of CHRISTmas, CHRIST the savior, who came to die for our sins.

"You can't celebrate true CHRISTmas, if you don't remember the true easter." Pastor Steve Janz

Peace Out,
Dan Van

Hey Hey,

What is up my friends.  So life is starting to pick up in my last year of High School.  Looking back it at my time at TCI I have changed so much.  Thanks to all my friends who brought me out of my shell.  Coming into a school not knowing many people and 3 years later I have a great group of friends that love me.  These are the best days of our life, lets not waste them with worrying about next year and the rest of our lives.  Tomorrow comes when it does.  The moment lasts for a second.  For those who have moved.  You are still loved and welcomed back at any moment.  Last point, Memories will be all you have to show for your life before grad, make sure that you have abundance so that you never forget these times we have together.

PEACE OUT,
Dan Van

There is one way to have true happiness, nothing earthly can give you that.

"If you can't hold yourself together. Why should I hold you now?" Just downloaded this song.  Its by a group called Anberlin.  You wanted me to care about you moving away, when all you did was try to get me to hold you.  I vouched for you, saying you werent a bad person.  How many times was I proven wrong?  I'm happy, now I don't have to have your stress on my shoulders.  Don't take it to personal.

I really couldnt sleep. So I thought I could post something quickly.  Was lookin at some pictures.  and wow, i really dont look that great wit long hair.  I look so much younger, then again i have changed a lots since last xmas.  But my eyes are starting to close i wanna get some sleep. 

Peace out,

DAN VAN

Hey,

Well, its been a year.  Life has changed,I have changed, and the world has changed.  I remember praying to God about what to do.  Wait or ask her out.  Thanks for the direction God.  Things just seem to fall into place.  I was nervous, didn't know if she was going to say yes or no.  Now a year later, I think that if I didnt ask, I probably would be a totally different person.  We have overcome struggles, and fights along the way.  We have faced up to each other when something was troubling us.  And for the first time in my life, I have missed someone, even before I left them.  This is truly a gift from God.  This past summer, even with all the things that I did when you were gone, I had thought about you all the time.  When I was down, you knew how to cheer me up, even if it was only for a few minutes.  I don't know what I would do with out you.  Courtney, you are the love of my life.  I want everyone to know that.  Life without you wouldn't be life.  I have never been so close to someone before.  I have shared all my secerts with you, I have even let you know my fears.  I love you.

Hey,

I just finished righting an essay about that topic.  That was a little bit hard, I had to think of something that would totally change my life.  Gah, I'm hungry.  Dinner is in a few minutes.  Gonna go help wit it.  PEACE OUT.

PS. SATURDAY 4oclock in the afternoon, FREE PIZZA, and the CONCERT.  Be at Transcona Alliance at the corner of Kildare and Redonda

YAWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWWN.  wow typed and yawned at the same time.  So tomorrow is an early dissmisal from TCI. That means, I have to be at skool early, HOW COULD THEY.  Im only their for an hour.  so im not gonna complain much.  TFK, SWEET.  I cant wait till the concert.  I dont think i can count on both hands and feet how many times i have seen them in concert.  I cant wait to get the car back later this week.  Dont have to walk in the cold anymore.  I wrote last year on msnspace, that a lot can change in a year.  That still stands true.  Big changes lay in front of us, how we face them is the way we are shaped to who we are suppose to be.  Thank God for everything that you have.  You could have nothing. Keep your friends close to you. Live Life, Have Fun, PEACE OUT

DAN VAN

So after thinking o so very hard, and talking wit mom(not dad), i have decided that i am getting a tattoo.  Thats rite.  It is gonna be awesome.  Ill try to get a pic on after I get it.

PEACE OUT,

DAN
VAN

So its now the end of my summer and I am SO excited to go back to school.  Not really, only to go hang wit friends and get kicked outta the hallway like always.  I gotta pretty good schedual, and if I make the changes that i want, then it will be awesome. I should header over to my bed so I can get some shut eye. PEACE OUT, LIVE LIFE, HAVE FUN.

God Bless,

DAN VAN

Hey,

Came back last month after my trip to edmonton and still have posted since then.  Well, YC was amazing, got to see all my fav bands.  The speakers were amazing, i learned a lot.  Oh, big announcment from the Underground Army(Pillars Fan Club) On Oct. 3 The Reconking will be released.  I cant wait for that to come out.  Well going out to camp this weekend and it going to be a blast.  Like honestly, 2 weeks of total fun in the sun man.  totally sweet. so back to my yc trip.  yea man, can you imagine 16000 youth singing praises to God.  That was an awesome to be apart of.  So school is over. WOOT WOOT, BOO YES.  two months of just working, and hanging, not worrying bout studying.  Only thing is that Courtney is going away for like 4 weeks after im gone for 2 so that like, wait gotta turn the brain back on.  O ya 6 weeks.  Cant wait for my bday.  7teen, its gonna be awesome.  Well gotta go pack. Peace Out, Live Life, Have Fun.

DAN VAN

Hey,

I so wish i could take credit for the look, but i can't.  Thanks Vickie.  Well I offically hate allergies.  Its so bad.  But meh, I'll be drugged up for the next little bit, but i gotta jet to go to school.  PEACE OUT.

DAN VAN

Hey Hey,

Well actually did homework today, only because Courtney told me.  Took me less amount of time so thats good.  I really dont want to work tomorrow, rather spend more time wit Courtney.  But i gotta go, im starting to pass out at the computer so c ya.

Hey Hey ppl,

Well I almost died today, STUPID MONSTER DRINKS.  Well, they didnt actually kill me i just decieded to have to many.  Thats always fun, it actually slowed my heart beat down, but i was hyper.  Well had a meeting at work today and well all know that these things are fun.  We got a talking to, discussed new ideas for the dishroom, at the end Curtis is like here is the Utilites times... Daniel the Grillers isnt done yet.  WTF i gotta go in tomorrow now.  Man drivin is fun.  Van tried to beat me down regent, HA my topaz killed them.  Topaz, crapy car but i love it to bits.  CRAP ive been hangin around Jo to much.  I wanna go to Mongos for lunch tomorrow.  MMMHMMM good food.

I really should be doin homework, but like always i never do homework.  Truly right now im trying to decied to say a deep dark secert or dont say it.  Cause it could hurt someone that i dont wanna see hurt even tho they ripped my heart out.  Well, i dont know if i do let it out it will have some message title that will let it be know.

Well, im gonna go, I need food and something else to do.

PEACE OUT, LIVE LIFE, HAVE FUN

Well, just when you think all the tears are gone and there is more to come.  Grant will be missed, he tought me much.  He was one of those people who no matter how long you knew him, he made you feel like you were he best friend.  I dont know why God took him at the time he did, but in the end He knows best.  We can die at any moment, please don't wait, you may not have a chance to make things right with God.  I don't want to see one of my friends die and go to hell.  We are mortal and may not be here tomorrow.  Well I'm off for now.

God Bless,
Dan Van

Hey PPL,

Heres the update wit my life.  Still going out with Courtney, and Were happy.  Im now the enemy in my house because my hair is  not the way my rents want it and so i get a talk everday.  Well im going out so i gotta jet so, cya Peace out

Dan Van

I am crazy, I have views that are radical, that go against everything and anything that is considered politically correct.  I think a great nation, like ours that started off as one that had the ONE, TRUE GOD as it center has wondered from it and has a lower set of morales.  Crazy because I wear my faith on my sleeve so all can see, no matter what people will say about me.  I can say that there is one way to complete happiness, and that there will never be complete peace in my life, but I can have peace in myself.  I believe in the commonly unknow, the thing I can't see, The thing I can feel, the one thing that brings me peace.  I will never let this go.  My God created me to be radical, to oppose the wrong, hate evil, and bring glory to God and God only.  That is my call, I will fight for my cause even if it brings me death.  My Faith is my life, science can try to prove me wrong, but they will lose in the end.  This has all been planned out.  Read the Great Book and you will find out that this not just a weird plan in my head.  I will not let this world become my home,  Im here for a short time only.  Death bring it on, you don't scare me I have the One on my side that conqured any power.  God give me the strenght I need to get through all the taunted and temptations that will face.  Amen.  

Peace Out, Dan Van

Today was a good day, Monty Python cracks and finding my MP3 player.  No classes for a week so thats good.  Just sitting 'round and thinking what oh what em I going to do.  BP tomorrow night.  I really need to get out of the house tomorrow, away from my sis.  5 minutes here and she is driving me crazy.  Well gonna jet. PeaceOut DanVan.

Hey,

Im sitting here, cant fall asleep.  Man I need sleep.  Well, life is slowly starting to speed up again.  A week and a bit is not enough time to have nothing to worry about.  One week left for this semisester, then i have a week off for to do nothing.  Cant wait till the 24-25 of Feburary for 2 Reception concerts.  BOO YES.  I get to see some of my friends that I havent seen in a while. Well im gonna jet. Peace Out. DAN VAN

I dont know what to do, i see you and its just like the knife that was stabbed into me is still there.  Scars are there, but they seem more like scabs.  Take this away, i need a break from it all.  Hold me in your arms till it all goes away. Peace Out
Let your thoughts go, don't think about it, life is life, what happens, happens.  Let things go, thats the way to live life.

Hey,

Well this is the first time I've written on here.  Its right after CHRISTmas and I'm in a good mood.  I created this I think back in October and I'm finally posting.  Well this is all i have to say is, I have changed so much.  Well Courtney is leaving for Assissippi in a few hours.  Sucks, I won't get to see her for the next week.  Well I'll see you people around.

Peace Out and Don't have to much fun.
